beers.description: Our Farmhouse Double IPA double dry hopped with Mosaic and conditioned on dried blueberries and hibiscus. 8.0%
beers.summary: Our Farmhouse Double IPA double dry hopped with Mosaic and conditioned on dried blueberries and hibiscus. 8.0%

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #22. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #22. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of maraschino cherries, awake minds coffee, blackcap raspberry, and cocoa powder.
beers.description: Zinfandel Grape Imperial Stout. 11.4% Brewed with oats and a plethora of specialty malts. Primary fermentation in stainless upon mountains of hand crushed Zinfandel grapes. The result is a complex and luscious reimagining of one of our most dark and devastating beers. No more hope. No more dawn. Only void.
beers.summary:
Zinfandel Grape Imperial Stout. 11.4% Brewed with oats and a plethora of specialty malts. Primary fermentation in stainless upon mountains of hand crushed Zinfandel grapes. The result is a complex and luscious reimagining of one of our most dark and devastating beers. No more hope. No more dawn. Only void.
Notes of maraschino cherries, awake minds coffee, blackcap raspberry, and cocoa powder.

beers.notes: Notes of freshly baked strudel, cake frosting, candy apple, graham cracker crust and crisp fall evenings.
beers.description: Double Milkshake IPA. 9.2% The latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats, fresh apple cider donuts from Linvilla Orchards, local apple cider, cinnamon, brown sugar, and lactose sugar. Conditioned atop luscious Madagascar vanilla beans and heaps of apple puree. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra (in-house only).
beers.summary:
Double Milkshake IPA. 9.2% The latest heavily amplified psychedelic riff on THE boundary-pushing Culinary IPA series. Brewed with gobs of oats, fresh apple cider donuts from Linvilla Orchards, local apple cider, cinnamon, brown sugar, and lactose sugar. Conditioned atop luscious Madagascar vanilla beans and heaps of apple puree. Intensely hopped and then dry hopped with Mosaic and Citra (in-house only).
Notes of freshly baked strudel, cake frosting, candy apple, graham cracker crust and crisp fall evenings.

beers.notes: Notes of fluffy chai latte, graham cracker crust, mango chutney, whipped topping, pumpkin pie, and deep tropical pineapple (in-house only).
beers.description: Double Milkshake IPA. 9.2% The latest nonsensical furthering of our genre defining Culinary IPA series. Brewed with heavy amounts of fresh sweet pumpkin puree, fluffy malted oats and red wheat. Hopped and dry hopped intensely with hand selected Citra and Mosaic. Conditioned atop a melange of Madagascar vanilla beans, fresh ginger, Ceylon black tea, cinnamon sticks, and cloves.
beers.summary:
Double Milkshake IPA. 9.2% The latest nonsensical furthering of our genre defining Culinary IPA series. Brewed with heavy amounts of fresh sweet pumpkin puree, fluffy malted oats and red wheat. Hopped and dry hopped intensely with hand selected Citra and Mosaic. Conditioned atop a melange of Madagascar vanilla beans, fresh ginger, Ceylon black tea, cinnamon sticks, and cloves.
Notes of fluffy chai latte, graham cracker crust, mango chutney, whipped topping, pumpkin pie, and deep tropical pineapple (in-house only).

beers.notes: Notes of blueberry scone, fresh linen, cranberry reduction, and brisk prosecco.
beers.description: Blueberry Brett Witbier. 6.0% A thoughtful blend of Carbonic macerated blueberry saison and witbier that was fermented with one of our favorite Belgian yeast strains along with our house brettanomyces culture harvested at our Dispensary (in-house only)
beers.summary:
Blueberry Brett Witbier. 6.0% A thoughtful blend of Carbonic macerated blueberry saison and witbier that was fermented with one of our favorite Belgian yeast strains along with our house brettanomyces culture harvested at our Dispensary (in-house only)
Notes of blueberry scone, fresh linen, cranberry reduction, and brisk prosecco.

beers.notes: Notes of tart cherry pie filling, fresh cut hay, meyer lemon flesh, and black tea leaf.
beers.description: Local Cherry Biere de Garde. 5.3% Brewed with pilsner malt and Belgian pale malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and boiled for many hours. Fermented in an open top stainless tank with our magickal saison yeast and microflora from second use local tart and sweet cherries from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm.
beers.summary:
Local Cherry Biere de Garde. 5.3% Brewed with pilsner malt and Belgian pale malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and boiled for many hours. Fermented in an open top stainless tank with our magickal saison yeast and microflora from second use local tart and sweet cherries from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm.
Notes of tart cherry pie filling, fresh cut hay, meyer lemon flesh, and black tea leaf.

beers.notes: Notes of candied yams, crisp fall evenings, clove cookies, and hard toffee candies.
beers.description: Sweet Potato Fest Bier. 5.8% Brewed with Munich and Crystal malts and a whole lot of Lancaster County sweet potatoes. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Fermented in stainless at cool temperatures with our house ale yeast.
beers.summary:
Sweet Potato Fest Bier. 5.8% Brewed with Munich and Crystal malts and a whole lot of Lancaster County sweet potatoes. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade. Fermented in stainless at cool temperatures with our house ale yeast.
Notes of candied yams, crisp fall evenings, clove cookies, and hard toffee candies.
